SEARCH
Module com.example.poo
Package com.example.poo.weapons_bullets

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.Weapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicWeapon, HomingWeapon, RocketWeapon
public abstract class Weapon extends Object
The Weapon class is an abstract class representing a generic weapon in the game. A weapon object will be used by any SpaceEntity to shoot certain type of Bullets objects

      Parameters:

      Gets the clock Object linked to this Weapon that have the time of it's creation

      Sets the damage that the bullet will inflict
      Parameters:
      newDamage - A int being the new value

    • addBullet

      public void addBullet(BulletEntity bullet)
      Method to link a Bullet object to the Weapon object. Every bullet that the object emits will be added here
      Parameters:
      bullet - The object just created

    • setNewTimeStep

      public void setNewTimeStep(int time)
      Sets a new time between two calls to the shoot method
      Parameters:
      time - An int being the new time

    • evolve

      public void evolve(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method called each frame from the SpaceEntity. Uses to call the evolve method of the bullet and delete it when it's need to be.
      Parameters:
      root - The Group Object used to display objects

    • hasActiveBullets

      public boolean hasActiveBullets()
      Checks if the Weapon has active bullets in the game
      Returns:
      A boolean that is true if there is active bullets liked to this Weapon object

    • display

      public void display(javafx.scene.Group root)
      Method called each frame in order to update the position of each bullet that had been shot by the weapon.
      Parameters:
      root - The Group Object used to display objects

    • shoot

      public abstract void shoot()
      Abstract method that will be call to fire from the Weapon Object. This method will vary for each type of Weapon entities
